title: Iron Hook
description: A full-stack e-commerce website with secure checkout, product/category management, and order tracking. Built with Stripe integration and MongoDB to simulate real-world store workflows.

title: Reddit Scroller
description: A subreddit browser that fetches and displays posts sorted by new, hot, or top. Uses Redditâ€™s JSON API with a simple, responsive UI.

title: Cube Nest
description: A landing page for modular living units, featuring Google Maps API integration and custom animations. Built to practice responsive layouts and motion effects.

title: Spotify Stats (Local)
description: Displays a user's top artists and tracks using the Spotify API. Runs locally due to API restrictions. Backend handles secure API requests via Express.

title: Freshlinc Website
description: A responsive website design for Freshlinc, focused on showcasing transport and logistics services. Emphasized a clean layout and cross-device compatibility.

title: Endeavour Website
description: Designed a modern, mobile-friendly website for Endeavour, emphasizing professional services and easy navigation. Built to strengthen front-end design skills.
